TopicTitle: Should I buy a replica Gravity Gun?

Articles.Content: I went into a shop a few days ago and saw a replica Gravity Gun from Half-Life 2 for sale... I was really tempted to buy it but it cost Ã‚Â£250... Should I buy it?

well that really depends on your level of disposable income.

If it were me it would be dear god no that's like all my monthly bills without the mortgage, to spend that on wall decoration, toy, whatever would be downright irresponsible and childish of me.

However to some people 250 lbs is a small amount of money to them it would be a casual purchase.

So really there is no way for us to tell you.

Should you buy it?

In a word - no.
